sources.title: First Period | FULL MOVIE | Indie Coming of Age Comedy
sources.description:
New girl Cassie and outcast Maggie are easily the most awkward girls in school, but when they make it their mission to win 1st place in the school talent show, not even 80s mean girls and boneheaded jocks can stand in their way.

#comedy #movies #free #80s #highschool #comingofage #meangirls #bullies #nerd #awkward #growingup #indie #absurd

metadata.Plot: New girl Cassie (Brandon Alexander III) and outcast Maggie (Dudley Beene) are easily the most awkward girls in high school. Together, they decide the way to win the hearts of the cute boys and popular girls is to come in first at the school talent show. But rivals Heather, Other Heather, and their popular boyfriends Brett and Dirk will stop at nothing to keep our heroes the laughing stock of the school. It's going to take makeovers, courage, and maybe even a little rapping to beat them in true 80s style.
metadata.Actors: Brandon Alexander III, Dudley Beene, Lauren Rose Lewis
